#include <stdio.h>
#define LOOP while (T--)

unsigned int inline fastInput()
{
    register unsigned int N = 0, C;
    while ((C = getchar()) < '0');
    
    do
    {
        N = (N<<3) + (N<<1) + C - '0';
    }while ((C = getchar()) >= '0');
    
    return N;
}
void inline fastOutput(unsigned int * res)
{
    register unsigned int N = * res , rev, count = 0;
    rev = N;
    if (N == 0)
    {
          putchar('0');
          putchar('\n');
          return ;
    }
    while ((rev % 10) == 0)
    {
          count++;
          rev /= 10;
    }
    rev = 0;
    while (N != 0)
    {
          rev = (rev<<3) + (rev<<1) + N % 10;
          N /= 10;
    }
    while (rev != 0)
    {
          putchar(rev%10 + '0');
          rev /= 10;
    }
    while (count--)
          putchar('0');
    putchar('\n');
    return ;
}

int main ()
{
	unsigned int T =  fastInput(), A, B, C, N, i, j, k, count;
	LOOP	
	{
		N = fastInput();
		A = fastInput();
		B = fastInput();
		C = fastInput();

		count = 0;
        if(A > N)
        A = N;
        for(i = 0; i <= A; i++)
			for(j = 0; j <= ((N - i < B) ? N - i : B); j++)
				count += 1 + ((i + j + C <= N) ? C : N - i - j);
        fastOutput(&count);
	}
	return 0;
}
